subject: Skiing
Olympic Games (2014)
Alpine Skiing
lead_paragraph: Mario Matt, 34, had never finished higher than 34th in three previous Olympic races. His teammate Marcel Hirscher won the silver, and Henrik Kristoffersen of Norway took the bronze.
snippet: Mario Matt, 34, had never finished higher than 34th in three previous Olympic races. His teammate Marcel Hirscher won the silver, and Henrik Kristoffersen of Norway took the bronze.
